name: relution-sdk
description: Relution Software Development Kit for TypeScript and JavaScript

scripts.gh-pages: git subtree push --prefix public/docs origin gh-pages
scripts.browserify: browserify index.js -o browser.js -u backbone -u jquery -u underscore -u socket.io-client -u node-localstorage -u websql
scripts.testify: browserify ./lib/index.spec.js -o browser.spec.js -u backbone -u jquery -u underscore -u socket.io-client -u node-localstorage -u websql

author: Thomas Beckmann
